overview: In 1932, a cop is killed and Frank Wiecek sentenced to life. Eleven years later, a newspaper ad by Frank's mother leads Chicago reporter P.J. O'Neal to look into the case. For some time, O'Neal continues to believe Frank guilty. But when he starts to change his mind, he meets increased resistance from authorities unwilling to be proved wrong.
tagline: It couldn't happen... but it did!
cast: James Stewart|Richard Conte|Lee J. Cobb|Helen Walker|Betty Garde
